snippet: The 49ers jumped to an insurmountable 7-0 lead over the hapless Jets and then piled on points. The most poetic part of this New York nightmare was the first touchdown.
abstract: The 49ers jumped to an insurmountable 7-0 lead over the hapless Jets and then piled on points. The most poetic part of this New York nightmare was the first touchdown.

headline.main: Week 4 Quick Hits: Niners Show How to Run Option Play
